---
name: About Section
about: Add an About section describing the project’s purpose and vision
labels: enhancement
---

**Describe the feature**
Add an About section to the website that explains the project’s purpose, vision, and what makes it unique. This section should be accessible from the main navigation.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- About section is visible and accessible
- Clearly describes the project’s goals and vision
- Optionally includes team information and project history

**Additional context**
This will help new users understand the value and background of the project.
